data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Zunyi, Guizhou, China. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zunyi, Guizhou, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 609,100 souls in Zunyi and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Zunyi access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Zunyi, Guizhou, China to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Hmong Daw people.
Lord, make the 46,207 believers in Zunyi to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 562,893 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Zunyi, Guizhou, China.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary:
the county of Zunyi, Guizhou, China has a population of 609,100.

We estimate Zunyi has 46,207 people who might know Jesus, 9,840 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 553,053 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 46,207 believers living in Zunyi, Guizhou, China.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.
